body:
Deku: (in the hospital, yet again) I’m fine.

Todoroki: Your fine? That’s good. I’m gonna put that on your tombstone. ‘He said he was fine. He was wrong.’

blog.name: pan-gya
blog.title: welcome to organized chaos
blog.description: welcome to my art blog that has slowly devolved into something else... ★it's my art ★they's my thoughts ★cool stuff that's not mine

tags: these seem fun so i wanted to try it out
i wanna chat with you guys!
i tried to match each question so it would kinda fit the character
body:
BNHA Ask Meme

send me a character, and i’ll answer

Aoyama: what is your favorite outfit style?

Ashido: what are your hobbies?

Asui: do you want to be friends?

Iida: what sports do you play, if any?

Uraraka: what occupation do you hope to be in?

Ojiro: when are you the happiest?

Kaminari: what is your go to movie or tv show?

Kirishima: who is your favorite character?

Koda: what is your favorite animal?

Sato: sweet or savory?

Shoji: who gives you the most comfort in your life?

Jirou: what is your favorite type of music?

Sero: are you a procrastinator or do you get things done quickly?

Tokoyami: how edgy are you?

Todoroki: do you have siblings?

Hagakure: are you an introvert or extrovert?

Bakugo: what is the thing you are the most touchy about?

Midoriya: what is your best subject in school?

Shinsou: what quirk would you have and why?

Yaoyorozu: ask me whatever you want!

blog.name: ellusquirk
blog.title: hi i'm ellie
blog.description: bnha, sds, khnm, opm | wattpad: elluspaghettu | requests: closed

summary: hello! could I request maybe.. a situation with Todoroki kind of like hide and seek but for an entire school/class. maybe there...
question: hello! could I request maybe.. a situation with Todoroki kind of like hide and seek but for an entire school/class. maybe there are teams or maybe reader and Todo happen to pass each other while one is being chased and hide together? I am in LOVE with that scenario man <3
answer:
hide and seek || shouto todoroki

You gnawed at your bottom lip anxiously as you jogged up the stairs, heart drumming loudly against your chest and ears straining for any sound of someone following you. You had been almost certain that Kaminari had seen you crouched behind one of the couches in the common area, and if he hadn’t seen you behind the couch then there was no doubt he would have seen you dash for the staircases, but judging by the absence of footsteps and shouts behind you, that wasn’t the case. For a brief second you risked a glance behind you, slowing slightly when you saw there was no one in hot pursuit of you. Your breaths were heavy and rapid, your legs beginning to grow heavy with fatigue as you pulled yourself up the final couple of steps, slamming you hand heavily into the door of the fourth floor and stumbling into the hallway.

Your eyes surveyed the hall, the small plaques on the door indicating your position. In your panic you had climbed your way to the left side of the fifth floor, the plaques on three of the doors confirming it - Sero, Todoroki and Satou. If you continued straight ahead there was a corner you could hide in, but you risked getting discovered if anyone came through the door that led to the girls section on the fifth floor. It was highly unlikely that anyone would though - the boys were banned from the girl’s sections, and as far as you were concerned only Jirou had been found out all of the girls, and with a ban on the elevators you doubted she would go to the effort of climbing to the top floor.

A grin slipped onto your lips, and you began to make your way down the corridor, eyes locked on the bend in the wall and the darkness that crept into the hallway from the corner. This win was surely yours - they were less likely to look for people in the higher levels first - so as long as everyone else had stayed in the levels below you - your victory was certainly guaranteed.

“Are you alright? Your breathing is irregular.”

A squeak escaped your lips at the sound of the voice right beside you, and you jumped away, head snapping to your left as you slapped your hand over your mouth. Todoroki’s turquoise and grey eyes stared at you blankly, studying your face slowly, eyebrows rising slightly as you pulled your hand away from your mouth and placed it over your heart instead.

“You scared the shit out of me!” you gasped. “Where did you even come from?”

Todoroki threw his thumb over his shoulder, gesturing at the open door leading to his room behind him. “My room.”

“You were hiding in there the entire time?”

“Well no one said I couldn’t.”

You nodded, hand dropping from your chest as you held his gaze for a moment, dropping it to the floor and nodding again. “Well, I’m going to go and hide before Kaminari or someone else pops up and gets us.”

“You can hide with me if you want.”

You started, lips parting slightly. “Are you sure?”

He nodded, stepping aside and gesturing to his open door.

You hesitated for a second, flinching when you suddenly heard Kaminari’s voice carrying up the stairs, and rushing into the room. Todoroki swiftly followed you, closing the door as quietly as possible behind him and gesturing to pillows of the floor. You sat down, and he sat in front of you, smiling ever so slightly when he made eye contact with you. An awkward silence fell over the two of you, the ticking of his alarm clock deafeningly loud, and drummed your fingers against your knee.

“So, what now?” you asked.

He shrugged. “We should probably be quiet.”

You opened your mouth, snapping it shut when you heard the door to the hallway creaking open and Kaminari and Ashido’s voices filling the silence. You waited with baited breath, Todoroki holding your gaze, letting the smile on his lips remain.

“Todoroki can’t have gone to his room, right?” Kaminari queried.

“Nah, that’s a cheap trick,” Ashido replied. “Plus I’m pretty sure they’re together so I doubt they’re in Todoroki’s room together.”

“I guess.”

The silence resumed, and the door to the corridor squeaked open, closing again once more. You let out a breath you hadn’t known you were holding in.

“That was a close one.”

Todoroki’s door slammed open. “I FOUND YOU!”

written on 20/05/19. requests: OPEN.

blog.name: it-zines
blog.title: AFTERMATH
blog.description:
A SFW My Hero Academia Zine with a theme of pain and anguish. Icon by Jest!

FAQ || TWITTER || SCHEDULE || KO-FI

body:
AFTERMATH Announcement!

Hey everyone! Mod Star and Mod Nadia here with an update on how things are going! 

Very soon, we’ll be releasing a post with an infographic detailing the absolutely awe-inspiring response we got to the interest check. We’re so humbled by each and every one of you who has expressed an interest in this project and shown your support, and we can’t thank you enough! 

We’d also like to remind everyone that our Mod Applications are currently open until May 31st, 2019. We’re looking forward to finalizing a great team here really soon! ٩(๑˃̵ᴗ˂̵)و

On the subject of building a great team, we’d like to extend an apology for the lack of activity recently. Life is always the first priority for any project, and our Head Mods have been finishing up their semester finals. We’ve been trying to answer asks and get information updated as we plan, so we apologize for any delays you may have noticed. Now that those are over, we’re really excited to launch back into the zine full force! We really appreciate everyone’s patience as we get things planned and ready to go. 

Again, thank you all so much for all your support, patience, and questions about the AFTERMATH zine. We can’t wait to really get the ball rolling! 

~Mod Star and Mod Nadia

blog.name: ao3feed-kiribaku
blog.title: Shitty Hair x Blasty Fanfics
blog.description:
☆Kirishima Eijirou/Bakugou Katsuki fanfics☆
☆Please check the FAQ before asking anything thank you☆
☆Created 3/18/2019, no fics from before this date can appear here☆

title: 結弦
description:
by Kkheeheehee

Nejire Hadou was an idol to many. She could sing in so many languages, she was unbelievably kind to all of her fans, she had never been involved in a stupid scandal and she always had a smile on her face. Tamaki Amajiki, however, was almost a polar opposite; a timid music student who doesn’t like to perform in front of anyone but his best friend Mirio. He could barely get two words out when speaking to his class, and to even think of doing the stuff Nejire did would surely give him a heart attack. At least.

Words: 909, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku
blog.description:
Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: I Just Want Your Text in the Morning
title: I Just Want Your Text in the Morning
description:
by isildursheir

Unknown number (12:58 PM): I thought I told you to leave me the fuck alone.

Izuku (1:03 PM): well i thought you were going to block me
Izuku (1:06 PM): ?

Unknown number (1:10 PM): I will if you don’t stop texting me like a fuckin stalker. God what a fuckin weirdo

Izuku (1:11 PM): can you say a sentence without swearing? just curious

Unknown number (1:21 PM): Can you learn to mind your own goddamn business?

Izuku (1:26 PM): i guess that’s a no

Unknown number (1:31 PM): FUCK. OFF.

(AKA my version of the texting fic that literally nobody asked for.)

Words: 3659, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English
